title: Your shop reset
body:
Hi,

So I got Star Guardian Lulu a few days ago for 70% off and today I decided to get the skin, but 'Your shop' got reset and now i have the skin for 50% off. It's also the first skin I am buying, so is there any chance I get the skin discounts before the reset?

Regards,

Katarouu

replies.body: i want my champion ship zed with 50%

i try a ticket and i already send the ticket
But i dont receive the championship zed
Porocles help me
does the your shop refresh every day or every week?

Nope, just the current set you have now.  Initially, there was an issue that required taking down the personalized shop. As a result players lost their first set.  We want to help with that, as it would be unfair if they missed out on something they were eager to get.
You bet!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into honoring the original discount!
you just need to contact support and ask them for it
